name: Jelly Bomb - Ludum Dare 37
description:
Jelly Bomb was created within 72 hours with 2 game developer. This game was made for Ludum Dare 37 with "One Room" theme.

Gameplay:

  1. Control: Up, Down, Left, and Right arrow (Keyboard)
  2. Press Spacebar to start the game.

Objective:

Try to dodge all the bomb on the tile, and survive as long as possible.

Have fun, and enjoy the game~! Cheers!
